title: 'You've won my heart' Bachelorette Angie Kent makes surprise revelation about firefighter Jamie
text:
Angie Kent is set to start her journey for romance when The Bachelorette premieres on October 9.

But it appears one of the hunks vying for the former Gogglebox star's heart is already a front runner in the competition - before the show has even aired.

Angie claimed hunky firefighter Jamie had 'already won her heart' during their first meeting in a sneak peek video - as he brought along a tiny puppy for the occasion.

'You've already won my heart' Bachelorette star Angie Kent (pictured) made a surprise revelation about one of the men vying for her heart in a sneak peek video on Friday

Before meeting Angie, the 39-year-old told the camera: 'I've got an advantage over these other guys... who does't like fire fighters, and puppies.'

And it appears Angie certainly agreed, as she gasped in excitement as Jamie arrived to greet her - who was of course adorned in his muscle-flashing firefighter uniform.

'I haven't even looked at your face!' Angie exclaimed to the muscly hero, before saying: 'You've already won my heart.

Puppy love! Jamie (pictured) used a little helping hand to try and win Angie's heart during introductions

'I can't even think of anything else. Do you want the rose?'

And Jamie's reason for bringing the tiny pup was almost as sweet as the pooch herself.

'The reason that I bought her in... is that I know about your love for dogs,' he said with confidence.

Over the moon! Angie was enamoured with Jamie after he handed over the bundle of joy

'I love dogs!' she agreed, before cuddling her face on the tiny brown puppy's.

Jamie is just one of the men set to battle it out for Angie's heart in the brand new matching-making series.

While it's unknown who wins her heart, Angie recently revealed she's still with the suitor she chose on the show.

'I'm totally glad I did it. I've learnt so much about myself,' she recently revealed to OK! Magazine.

The Bachelorette premieres Wednesday, October 9 at 7.30pm on Channel 10.
description: Angie Kent is set to start her journey for romance when The Bachelorette premieres on October 9.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
